languages.text: {n}Превозмогая слабость и боль, напрягая каждую мышцу в теле, вы медленно поднимаетесь на ноги, выпрямляетесь и смотрите великану прямо в лицо. Уралон улыбается, но в его глазах нет веселья — лишь злое любопытство, с которым смотрят на насекомое с оторванными крыльями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Превозмогая слабость и боль, напрягая каждую мышцу в теле, вы медленно поднимаетесь на ноги, выпрямляетесь и смотрите великану прямо в лицо. Уралон улыбается, но в его глазах нет веселья — лишь злое любопытство, с которым смотрят на насекомое с оторванными крыльями.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Conquering the weakness and pain, straining every muscle in your body, you slowly rise to your feet, straighten, and stare Uralon straight in the eye. He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Превозмогая слабость и боль, напрягая каждую мышцу в теле, вы медленно поднимаетесь на ноги, выпрямляетесь и смотрите великану прямо в лицо. Уралон улыбается, но в его глазах нет веселья — лишь злое любопытство, с которым смотрят на насекомое с оторванными крыльями.{/n}

He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}

{n}Conquering the weakness and pain, straining every muscle in your body, you slowly rise to your feet, straighten, and stare Uralon straight in the eye. He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}

{n}Conquering the weakness and pain, straining every muscle in your body, you slowly rise to your feet, straighten, and stare Uralon straight in the eye. He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}

{n}Conquering the weakness and pain, straining every muscle in your body, you slowly rise to your feet, straighten, and stare Uralon straight in the eye. He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Superando tu debilidad y dolor, y forzando cada músculo de tu cuerpo, logras levantarte a duras penas, erguirte y mirar a Uralon a los ojos. Sonríe, pero no hay alegría alguna en sus ojos: solo una malvada curiosidad, la misma con la que uno miraría a un insecto con las alas arrancadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Conquering the weakness and pain, straining every muscle in your body, you slowly rise to your feet, straighten, and stare Uralon straight in the eye. He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Superando tu debilidad y dolor, y forzando cada músculo de tu cuerpo, logras levantarte a duras penas, erguirte y mirar a Uralon a los ojos. Sonríe, pero no hay alegría alguna en sus ojos: solo una malvada curiosidad, la misma con la que uno miraría a un insecto con las alas arrancadas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}脱力感と痛みに打ち勝ち、全身の筋肉に力を入れてゆっくりと立ち上がりる。背筋を伸ばし、ウラロンの目をまっすぐに見つめた。彼はにやりを笑ったが、その目には愉快さは一切見えない。羽をむしられた昆虫を見つめるような、悪意のこもった好奇心だけが宿っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Conquering the weakness and pain, straining every muscle in your body, you slowly rise to your feet, straighten, and stare Uralon straight in the eye. He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}脱力感と痛みに打ち勝ち、全身の筋肉に力を入れてゆっくりと立ち上がりる。背筋を伸ばし、ウラロンの目をまっすぐに見つめた。彼はにやりを笑ったが、その目には愉快さは一切見えない。羽をむしられた昆虫を見つめるような、悪意のこもった好奇心だけが宿っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你战胜了身体中的虚弱与疼痛，绷紧每块肌肉，慢慢站起了身，挺直腰板，直视着乌拉隆的眼睛。他笑了，但他眼中透露出的不是喜悦，而是恶意的好奇，仿佛在看着被扯掉翅膀的昆虫垂死挣扎一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Conquering the weakness and pain, straining every muscle in your body, you slowly rise to your feet, straighten, and stare Uralon straight in the eye. He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你战胜了身体中的虚弱与疼痛，绷紧每块肌肉，慢慢站起了身，挺直腰板，直视着乌拉隆的眼睛。他笑了，但他眼中透露出的不是喜悦，而是恶意的好奇，仿佛在看着被扯掉翅膀的昆虫垂死挣扎一般。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Faisant appel à tous les muscles de votre corps, vous parvenez à surmonter la faiblesse et la douleur, et commencez à vous relever lentement, puis à vous redresser avant de regarder Uralon droit dans les yeux. Il esquisse un sourire lugubre, les yeux empreints d'une curiosité malsaine, celle de quelqu'un qui vient d'arracher les ailes d'un insecte pour mieux l'observer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Conquering the weakness and pain, straining every muscle in your body, you slowly rise to your feet, straighten, and stare Uralon straight in the eye. He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Faisant appel à tous les muscles de votre corps, vous parvenez à surmonter la faiblesse et la douleur, et commencez à vous relever lentement, puis à vous redresser avant de regarder Uralon droit dans les yeux. Il esquisse un sourire lugubre, les yeux empreints d'une curiosité malsaine, celle de quelqu'un qui vient d'arracher les ailes d'un insecte pour mieux l'observer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du überwindest die Schwäche und den Schmerz, strengst jeden Muskel in deinem Körper an, erhebst dich langsam, richtest dich auf und starrst Uralon direkt in die Augen. Er lächelt, doch in seinem Blick liegt keine Freude — nur bösartige Neugier, als würde er ein Insekt beobachten, dem die Flügel abgerissen wurden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Conquering the weakness and pain, straining every muscle in your body, you slowly rise to your feet, straighten, and stare Uralon straight in the eye. He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du überwindest die Schwäche und den Schmerz, strengst jeden Muskel in deinem Körper an, erhebst dich langsam, richtest dich auf und starrst Uralon direkt in die Augen. Er lächelt, doch in seinem Blick liegt keine Freude — nur bösartige Neugier, als würde er ein Insekt beobachten, dem die Flügel abgerissen wurden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vücudundaki tüm kasları kullanıp zayıflığını ve çektiğin acıyı aşarak yavaşça ayağa kalkıyor, dikeliyor ve Uralon'un gözlerinin içine bakıyorsun. Gülümsüyor ama gözlerinde hoşnutluk değil, bedhah bir merak görüyorsun. Kendini, insanlar tarafından kanatları koparılarak işkenceye maruz bırakılan bir böcek gibi hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Conquering the weakness and pain, straining every muscle in your body, you slowly rise to your feet, straighten, and stare Uralon straight in the eye. He smiles, but there is no mirth in his eyes — only malicious curiosity, the kind with which one looks at an insect with its wings torn off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vücudundaki tüm kasları kullanıp zayıflığını ve çektiğin acıyı aşarak yavaşça ayağa kalkıyor, dikeliyor ve Uralon’un gözlerinin içine bakıyorsun. Gülümsüyor ama gözlerinde hoşnutluk değil, bedhah bir merak görüyorsun. Bu, sana bir böceğin kanatlarını kopararak ona işkence eden çocukları hatırlatıyor.{/n}
